data.eml:eml: Revision of the Palaearctic species of Eupelmus (Eupelmus) Dalman (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea: Eupelmidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gary A. P. Gibson, Lucian Fusu (2016): Revision of the Palaearctic species of Eupelmus (Eupelmus) Dalman (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea: Eupelmidae). Zootaxa 4081 (1): 1-331, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4081.1.1
